statements: SELECT * FROM cancer_patients;
SELECT patient_name, total_bill FROM cancer_patients WHERE total_bill > 1000;
SELECT insurance_provider, billing_address FROM cancer_patients WHERE insurance_provider = 'ABC Insurance';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM cancer_patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM cancer_patients WHERE total_bill < 5000 ORDER BY total_bill DESC;
SELECT * FROM cancer_patients WHERE total_bill > 5000 ORDER BY total_bill DESC, patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name,insurance_provider FROM cancer_patients WHERE insurance_provider='Blue Cross' AND billing_address LIKE '%Avenue%'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, total_bill FROM cancer_patients WHERE total_bill < 1000 OR insurance_provider='Medicare' ORDER BY patient_id ASC
SELECT * FROM cancer_patients WHERE billing_address IS NULL
SELECT * FROM cancer_patients WHERE patient_name LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT * FROM billing_info;
SELECT billing_id, amount FROM billing_info WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM insurance_info WHERE insurance_company = 'BlueCross';
SELECT insurance_id, policy_number FROM insurance_info ORDER BY insurance_id DESC;
SELECT billing_date, amount FROM billing_info WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM billing_info;
SELECT billing_id, patient_id, amount, billing_date FROM billing_info WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM insurance_info WHERE insurance_company = 'ABC Insurance';
SELECT patient_id, billing_date, amount FROM billing_info WHERE billing_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT ins.insurance_company, bi.amount FROM insurance_info ins JOIN billing_info bi ON ins.patient_id = bi.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM BillingInformation
SELECT PatientName, BillingAmount FROM BillingInformation WHERE PaymentStatus='Unpaid'
SELECT * FROM BillingInformation ORDER BY BillingAmount DESC
SELECT PatientName, InsuranceCompany FROM BillingInformation WHERE BillingAmount > 1000
SELECT AccountID, PolicyNumber, PaymentStatus FROM BillingInformation WHERE PaymentStatus='Paid'
SELECT * FROM BillingInformation WHERE PaymentStatus='Paid'
SELECT PatientName, BillingAmount FROM BillingInformation WHERE BillingAmount > 1000 ORDER BY BillingAmount DESC
SELECT * FROM BillingInformation WHERE InsuranceCompany='XYZ Insurance' AND PaymentStatus='Pending'
SELECT AccountID, PatientName, PolicyNumber FROM BillingInformation WHERE PolicyNumber IS NOT NULL ORDER BY AccountID ASC
SELECT COUNT(AccountID) AS TotalAccounts, SUM(BillingAmount) AS TotalBillingAmount FROM BillingInformation
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM Patients WHERE patient_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM BillingInfo ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, insurance_name FROM Patients JOIN InsuranceProviders ON Patients.insurance_id = InsuranceProviders.insurance_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, CancerTypes.cancer_name FROM Patients JOIN CancerTypes ON Patients.patient_id = CancerTypes.cancer_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients LEFT JOIN BillingInfo ON Patients.patient_id = BillingInfo.patient_id WHERE BillingInfo.payment_status = true;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM Patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, insurance_provider FROM patients;
SELECT appointment_date, doctor_name FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_cost, start_date, end_date FROM treatments WHERE patient_id = 101;
SELECT invoice_id, total_amount, status FROM invoices WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY invoice_date;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE insurance_provider = 'BlueCross';
SELECT patient_name, billing_address FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_cost, start_date, end_date FROM treatments WHERE end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date, cost FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id WHERE doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT patient_name, invoice_date, total_amount FROM patients JOIN invoices ON patients.patient_id = invoices.patient_id WHERE status = 'Paid' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
